SQL_STMT_U.val: select mqdt_admno, mqdt_clntno, clnt110_name1, agda_dateagenda, agda_userid, agda_contact, mqdt_activeuser, agda_id, mqdt_lineno, mqdt_usrid from :1/mqdt, :1/clnt, :1/agda where clnt101_admno = mqdt_admno and clnt102_clntno = mqdt_clntno and agda_id = mqdt_invo_no and mqdt_mqty_id = :2 and mqdt_dept_code = ':3' and agda_datehandled is null :4 :5 :6 :7 order by mqdt_admno, mqdt_clntno for fetch only
